title: Troubleshoot a Disapproved Ad
description: An ad has been disapproved by the ad platform for violating a policy. A manager needs to diagnose and fix the issue.

tasks.description: Identify the disapproved ad and the specific policy violation cited by the platform (e.g., 'Misleading Claims').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the ad and the reason for disapproval.

tasks.description: Review the ad copy and landing page to find the content that violates the policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a claim in the ad copy that is unsubstantiated on the landing page.

tasks.description: Edit the ad copy to remove the problematic claim.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent rewrites the ad to be compliant.
The ad is sent back to the platform for a new review.
